Name: Bio Prototype
About the game: Wake up wake up wake up being transformed into a monster in a dish. . One by one voice, voice, voice, voice, voice, tell, just, just believe her? The irrational experiment comes at you like a tidal wave. You need to use its organs to mutate yourself, and the splicing of different parts is incomparable to me. Mutate quickly! Entering! Monsters scarier than them! Use flesh and blood to find a way to survive! The madness of the experiment comes at you like a tidal wave. Mutate quickly! Progress! Monsters scarier than them! Use flesh and blood to lay a path to survival! Tired of rigid skill routines? Come create your own skills! Touch Clockwork for custom skills. Effects of custom abilities. Connect technologies to each other to form an exponentially increasing attack cycle. Create projectiles of various shapes? Breed thousands of offspring of various types to help you fight? Spread the deadly virus and let the source of the plague spread from ten to hundreds? More than 40 kinds of wonderful organs, 19 special character designs of different colors, and infinite combinations are constructed, and the effect is really exciting!
